text: Božidar Pavićević (9 January 1932 – 13 July 2004) was a Serbian actor. He appeared in more than one hundred films from 1955 to 1997. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! title: Božidar Pavićević
